SELECT i.* FROM inspector i LEFT JOIN inspector_road ir ON ir.inspector_id = i.id LEFT JOIN road r ON ir.road_id = r.id
i.logic_delete = 0
AND r.road_name LIKE CONCAT(#{inspectorDTO.roadName}, '%')
AND i.name LIKE CONCAT(#{inspectorDTO.name}, '%')
AND i.phone LIKE CONCAT(#{inspectorDTO.phone}, '%')
GROUP BY i.id
